sentences.en: A unique example of the slack disaphragm is the draft gage.
sentences.cn: 弱膜片的典型例子是风压计.

sentences.en: Bell gages may be used to measure gage pressure or differential pressure.
sentences.cn: 浮钟式压力计可以用来测量计示压力或差压力.

sentences.en: Can you gage what her reaction is likely to be?
sentences.cn: 你能揣测她的反应可能是什么吗？

sentences.en: Clip - gage excitation was supplied by a commercially available power supply ( signal conditioner ).
sentences.cn: 回形引伸计的激励电压由商售的通用电源装置 ( 信号调制器 ) 来提供.

sentences.en: Duplicate 12 - in . long specimens were calibrated with an 8 - in . gage length.
sentences.cn: 两个完全相同的12英寸试样用8英寸标距来标定.

sentences.en: Gage pressure is a special case of differential pressure.
sentences.cn: 计示压力是差压力的一种特殊情况.

sentences.en: The above circuIt'serves to illustrate the principle of the gage.
sentences.cn: 上述线路图是用来说明应变计的作用原理的.

sentences.en: The bonded - foil gage monitored with a wheatstone bridge has become a highly perfected measuring system.
sentences.cn: 用惠斯登电桥监测的粘贴 ― 箔式应变片已成为高度完善的测量系统.

sentences.en: The classical examples are strain gage devices.
sentences.cn: 传统的例子是应变仪装置.

sentences.en: The gage deflection is due to the momentum transfer.
sentences.cn: 压力计的偏转是由于动量交换的原因.

sentences.en: The interferometric strain gage offers a method for measuring strain without actual use of a gage.
sentences.cn: 干涉应变计提供了一种实际上不用仪器测量应变的方法.

sentences.en: The simplest version of the thermocouple gage consists of a resistance wire.
sentences.cn: 最简单的热电偶真空计是由电阻丝组成.

sentences.en: The stability of the gage will be seriously impaired.
sentences.cn: 应变片的稳定性将被严重削弱.

sentences.en: The strain gage based on mechanical principles is the scratch gage.
sentences.cn: 以机械原理为基础的应变计是刻痕应变计.

sentences.en: Two basic forms of the resistance strain gage are the bounded and the unbounded types.
sentences.cn: 电阻应变片有粘贴式和非粘贴式两种基本形式.

trans.tran_cn: 厚度，直径，测量仪表，规格
